name: Kafka consumer lag from slow downstream
description: Email gateway SMTP connection pool exhausted due to rate limiting by upstream provider, causing consumer lag to spike as notification-service backs up
prompt:
Alert: Kafka consumer group "notifications" lag at 450,000 messages and growing.
notification-service pods healthy but processing rate near zero.
Users reporting delayed email notifications (30+ minutes).
Investigate and find the root cause.
initOutput:
Gilfoyle Environment Discovery
==============================

Axiom Environments:
  prod:
    datasets: [application_logs, infrastructure_logs, kafka_metrics]

Grafana Environments:
  prod:
    datasources: [Prometheus (uid: prom-1)]

Slack:
  Available (workspace: acme)

application_logs.event.message: Processed batch of 50 messages from kafka.notifications.0
application_logs.host.name: node-b

application_logs.message: Upstream SMTP response: 429 Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded for account_id: AC-9942
Failed to acquire connection from pool 'smtp-outbound' after 5000ms

application_logs.msg: Error processing kafka message: remote service timeout

application_logs.message: failed to flush buffer to s3: context deadline exceeded

application_logs.msg: Consumer group 'notifications' rebalance triggered by member leave

requiredQueries.description: Search email-gateway logs for errors related to connections or rate limits.
Monitor the lag of the consumer group.
